text: The Palace of Fine Arts () is the most important cultural center in Mexico. It is located in the historic center of Mexico City. The building has several murals by Diego Rivera, Siqueiros and others. Exhibitions and theatrical performances take place here, including performances of the Ballet Folklorico de Mexico. == References == == Other websites == * Palacio de Bellas Artes website *Palacio de Bellas Artes - Insight Category:Buildings and structures in Mexico City Category:Museums in North America Category:Cultural heritage monuments in Mexico
title: Palace of Fine Arts (Mexico)
